com.krupizde.persistence

Class DaoUserProfiles

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.krupizde.persistence.DaoUserProfiles

  • public class DaoUserProfiles
extends java.lang.Object
    Dao class for working with profiles and users in database. Uses a singleton
    Author:
    Zdeněk Krupička (radamanak@gmail.com)

        public void addUsersAndProfiles(java.lang.String file,
                                java.lang.String path)
        Method iterates loaded users from given file and inserts them into database.
        Parameters:
        file - Path to file from which to load profile names
        path - Path to root folder where to save all mediums of loaded profiles
